li.a: Pineville Independent School District Student Handbook

article.class: post-588 page type-page status-publish hentry et-doesnt-have-title_meta

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_testimonial et_pb_testimonial_0 clearfix et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_testimonial_no_image

h1.strong: “I come home and think how lucky I am to go to a great school that I call home with teachers who are like family. Pineville Independent is a place that makes you feel that you can do anything. It is a place where you can have hope for your life.”

h2.strong: -Gracie Branstutter, 6th Grade Student at Pineville Independent

et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_0 et_clickable et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_top

div.p: Kentucky Center for School Safety is proud to provide an email tipline to all Kentucky schools.

The Safety Tipline, Online Prevention or S.T.O.P Tipline is designed for use as an “online” reporting/prevention tool. If students, parents or community members know of an unsafe situation in school (bullying, weapons, drugs or alcohol, etc.), they can anonymously pass on that information to school personnel by using this basic email format.
Click on the STOP sign above to make a report.
